title: Legacy
description: Aunt Hattie always was a strange one, but Marissa didn't realize how strange until she inherited her old aunt's house. Marissa is plunged into strange and dangerous world of warring werewolves, battle scarred cops, family secrets and inhuman passions. If she's to survive, she will have to learn who she can trust, who she can love, and above all else, who-- or what-- she really is.Written by a winner of the Writers of the Future award for emerging talent in fantasy and science fiction, Legacy will take you on a journey outside the safe world of the everyday, where the hunters can all too quickly become the hunted.
author: David Parish-Whittaker
